about_the_game:
Set Sail for Glory in Crimson Cutlass

Ahoy! Get ready for an action-packed rogue-lite pirate adventure where mutiny could make you captain—or send you to the depths! Battle fierce foes, explore endless islands, and upgrade your ship to survive a world that’s as unpredictable as the sea. Every voyage is different, every battle feels fresh, and the stakes get higher with every encounter.

Mutiny, Lead, and Conquer—Or Be Overthrown

In this crew, you either lead or walk the plank. As captain, your choices shape your crew’s destiny, but mutiny’s always lurking. In local and online co-op, depending on one's playstyle, you and your mate might just find yourselves in an battle for the throne. Will you keep your crew loyal, or will a backstabbing scoundrel take the helm? One thing’s for sure: the seas are always testing your resolve.

Endless Adventure, Non-Stop Action

Set sail to procedurally generated islands full of ancient treasures, strange cultures, and monstrous creatures. Brave violent storms, face off against giant bosses, and raid rival ships for loot. Upgrade your ship, recruit colorful crew members, and unleash magical powers from the mysterious deep to fight back. Every island hides something new—and who knows what you’ll discover next?

Replayable, Addictive, and Forever Shifting

The high seas never stay the same. With randomized encounters, new quests, and treasures beyond your wildest dreams, you’ll never know what’s coming next. Craft the perfect crew, arm yourself with legendary weapons, and experience a new challenge every time you set sail. The ocean is vast, and its secrets are endless.

Join the Crew – Wishlist Now

Ready to carve your name into pirate history? Wishlist now
Become a legend before the game launches, and set sail on your own pirate adventure.
The winds are changing, and the seas are calling—don’t miss out!

Unique Selling Points

  • Captain System & Mutiny: In Crimson Cutlass, small-scale PvP comes to life with the Captain System. The second player has the opportunity to mutiny and challenge the first player for control of the ship’s captaincy. Will you stay loyal, or will the seas decide who is in charge? This mechanic adds a dynamic twist to cooperative play, giving both players a chance to influence the story and gameplay.

  • Dynamic Ship Combat: Engage in ship-to-ship battles, board enemy vessels, and defend your ship from attacks. Use upgradable cannons, strategic abilities, and quick thinking to outsmart your foes. The sea is full of challenges, and only the most cunning pirates will survive.

  • Procedural World: Explore a dynamic fantasy water world with procedurally generated islands, each offering unique cultures, hidden treasures, and secrets. Discover a variety of environments and randomized encounters to keep each journey fresh and exciting. No two adventures are the same.

  • Local & Online Co-Op: Team up with a friend in local and online co-op via Steam Remote Play. Share the adventure, uncover mysteries, and face off against foes together in a seamless, collaborative experience. The adventure is always better when shared.

  • Character Progression: Unlock and upgrade characters with distinct abilities and combat styles. Choose your playstyle, strengthen your crew, and adapt to challenges as you grow. Priscilla’s playful, agile combat contrasts with Gymmaine’s focused, powerful approach—mix and match your ability kit to suit your style.

  • Replayability: Crimson Cutlass offers high replayability, with dynamic quests, randomized ship encounters, and an evolving world that changes with every playthrough. Collect treasure, upgrade abilities, and uncover hidden lore as you progress. The Captain’s Log, bestiary, and cosmetic features evolve with each upgrade you perform ensuring that no two runs are ever the same.

  • A Story-Rich World: Engage with quirky characters and uncover the secrets of a fractured world. Discover the rich backstories of Priscilla, Gymmaine, and their allies as they struggle against powerful enemies and search for treasure. The world’s dynamic storytelling unfolds as you explore, with surprises at every corner.

Why Wishlist Crimson Cutlass?

Be Part of the Journey: As a wishlist supporter, you’ll be the first to hear about updates, special events, and exciting community-driven content. Share your thoughts and feedback to help shape the future of Crimson Cutlass.
